title: defective Pixel 2 XL under warranty replacement
content:
Hello Google community, 

The Pixel 2 XL i purchased from Google store is eligible for replacement due to defective recharge port (USB C female port). 

Is it possible to have Google replace my defective Pixel 2 XL with a Pixel 4 (when it comes out to the public on Google store)?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Cheers,
Moh
